name: Flipping Madness
description:
Flipping Madness is a fun, skilful and addictive game!

Perform lots of stunning gymnastic moves and tricks, do more than just backflips!

Try front flips, side flips, flips off walls, hands and no hands flips, and barrel rolls all in stunning real-time 3D in a highly detailed gymnasium!

Select from male and female avatar characters, pull off the moves to earn points and gold coins!

It's easy to play, simply tap the screen at key points in a motion to complete the trick successfully!

Use the Show Me and Teach Me features to help you learn how to pull off each move with ease!

Features realistic physics simulation and Easy, Normal and Hard skill settings for all levels of players.
